EmailTemplate.name: Email to A/C Owner if Contact updated from Kanlet
EmailTemplate.subject: Contact Updates Received from Kanlet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Contact Updates Notification
Contact Updates Notification
Hello {!User.Name} ,
New contact updates have been received from Kanlet. Please review the changes.
You can view the updated contacts by clicking the button below:
View Contact Updates
If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us.
Best regards, Kanlet Team
